channel.title: Item slots
channel.description: ok so i've made the sled work with the emotes an everything (kind of) but now im trying to make an item commonly known as "ROF" Ring Of Flying if anyone can help with this i'd be gratefull. im tryingg to turn the p ring into it and i've gone into the item.java file and added it with all the other weapon emotes to make you float and then when you walk/run do the superman emote but now i just need to get in the weapon slot how the fack do i do this? i can only put in all the other slots theres no: "public static int weapons[] =" this is [PI] btw

item.title: Item slots
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I’m not going on TeamViewer every time somebody has a problem. Look at the current Rings[] array and copy it and rename it Weapons[].

public static final int[] WEAPONS = {773};

Then scroll near the bottom look for something similar to the following, and add

if (Arrays.binarySearch(WEAPONS, itemID) > 0) {
			return Constants.EQUIPMENT_SLOT_WEAPONS;
		}

Yours will be slightly different because I don’t use or even have PI. So adjust accordingly.You can use what’s already there as an example.

Read full topic

item.title: Item slots
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Then just create a weapon array. All other weapons will still equip as a weapon without adding them all to the array. Just use it for the ring.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jr_fizzy wrote:

The Outsider:

Search “773” through the entire file in case there’s a duplicate. There usually is.

i did this aswell not calling your idea dumb but im not an idiot >.< you got teamviewer? maybe i could show you and you might see what im doing wrong.

item.title: Item slots
item.dc:creator: @jr_fizzy jr fizzy
item.description:
@jr_fizzy wrote:

The Outsider:

Remove it from the ring slot and by default all items not defined go in the weapon slot.

i tried this i went to the rings area and removed “773” compiled succesfully restarted the server logged in wield the ring and yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay it goes in the ring slot -.-’

Read full topic
